below it.

item.title: ::rules
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

class, interface, or enum expected means your code is outside of a method. looking at your code, it looks like it is outside the closing brace of your command parser.

public class Example {

    private void methodExample() {
      //if goes here

    }
//yours is here and complier expecting one of these
    private [interface/enum/class] Sub_Example {

    }

}

Read full topic

item.title: ::rules
item.dc:creator: @tanqilla tanqilla
item.description:
@tanqilla wrote:

Try adding this to your commands.java

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("rules")) { c.Rules(); }

Try adding this in your client.java

It will show up an interface if your using PI, I find it much easier.

public void Rules() { getPA().showInterface(6308); getPA().sendFrame126("Close Window", 6401); getPA().sendFrame126("", 6399); getPA().sendFrame126(" PilgrimX Rules", 6402); getPA().sendFrame126(" Be sure to rember the rules! ", 6403); getPA().sendFrame126("---------------------------------------------------", 6404); getPA().sendFrame126("1. Do not scam or encourage others to.", 6405); getPA().sendFrame126("1. Do not scam or encourage others to.", 6406); getPA().sendFrame126("3. Do not flame or use racial or offensive language.", 6407);

item.title: ::rules
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Loveandpower:

what is the error…

If {playerCommand.startsWith(“rules”) } {

The expression should be surrounded by quotes and the ‘if’ should be in lower-case.

ie

if (playerCommand.startsWith("rules")) { c.sendMessage ("Thank you for viewing our rules."); c.sendMessage("1. Do not scam or encourage others to."); c.sendMessage("2. Do not ask for staff, it is earned."); c.sendMessage("3. Do not flame or use racial or offensive language."); c.sendMessage("4. Listen to staff, any issues report it on the forums."); c.sendMessage("5. Absolutely no tolerance for Advertising servers and websites."); c.sendMessage("6. Do not abuse bugs or glitchs."); }

Read full topic

item.description:
@portugalrox wrote:

c.sendMessage ("Thank you for viewing our rules.") ;
c.sendMessage ("1. Do not scam or encourage others to.") ;
c.sendMessage ("2. Do not ask for staff, it is earned.") ;
c.sendMessage ("3. Do not flame or use racial or offensive language.") ;
c.sendMessage ("4. Listen to staff, any issues report it on the forums.") ;
c.sendMessage ("5. Absolutely no tolerance for Advertising servers and websites.") ;
c.sendMessage ("6. Do not abuse bugs or glitchs.") ;

}
